title: Pytorch 0.4.0 failed build
body_html:
Issue description

Pytorch 0.4.0 build fails on an unsuported GPU (GeForce GTX 960M) when building ATen_generated_SpectralOps.cu.o

[ 51%] Building NVCC (Device) object src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/native/cuda/ATen_generated_RoiPooling.cu.o
[ 51%] Building NVCC (Device) object src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/native/cuda/ATen_generated_SparseMM.cu.o
/home/florin/Tools/pytorch40/aten/src/ATen/native/cuda/Embedding.cu(37): warning: function "__any"
/usr/local/cuda/include/device_atomic_functions.h(180): here was declared deprecated ("__any() is deprecated in favor of __any_sync() and may be removed in a future release (Use -Wno-deprecated-declarations to suppress this warning).")

[ 52%] Building NVCC (Device) object src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/native/cuda/ATen_generated_SpectralOps.cu.o
/usr/include/c++/6/tuple: In instantiation of ‘static constexpr bool std::_TC<<anonymous>, _Elements>::_MoveConstructibleTuple() [with _UElements = {std::tuple<at::Tensor&, at::Tensor&, at::Tensor&>}; bool <anonymous> = true; _Elements = {at::Tensor&, at::Tensor&, at::Tensor&}]’:

...
[see full log below]

src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/build.make:1183: recipe for target 'src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/native/cuda/ATen_generated_SpectralOps.cu.o' failed
make[2]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/native/cuda/ATen_generated_SpectralOps.cu.o] Error 1
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:201: recipe for target 'src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/all] Error 2
Makefile:129: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2

Code example

Full error_log

System Info

  • PyTorch: 0.4.0 200fb22
  • How you installed PyTorch: source (installation failed)
  • Build command you used:
export CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH=/home/florin/Tools/anaconda3
conda create -n torch40 python==3.6
conda install numpy pyyaml mkl mkl-include setuptools cmake cffi typing
conda install -c pytorch magma-cuda91

git checkout tags/v0.4.0
git submodule update --init

export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/home/florin/Tools/anaconda3/envs/torch40/lib/ (it will not find mkl_64.so otherwise)

python setup.py install
  • OS: Ubuntu 17.10 x86_64
  • Python version: 3.6.0
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: release 9.1, V9.1.85 / cudnn 7.1 patchlevel 3
  • GPU models and configuration: GeForce GTX 960M - 390.48
  • GCC version (if compiling from source): 6.4.0 (gcc, g++, cc, c++)
  • CMake version: 3.9.4 in /anaconda/envs/torch40/cmake
  • Versions of any other relevant libraries: conda 4.5.1

body:
## Issue description
Pytorch 0.4.0 build fails on an unsuported GPU (GeForce GTX 960M) when building `ATen_generated_SpectralOps.cu.o`

```
[ 51%] Building NVCC (Device) object src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/native/cuda/ATen_generated_RoiPooling.cu.o
[ 51%] Building NVCC (Device) object src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/native/cuda/ATen_generated_SparseMM.cu.o
/home/florin/Tools/pytorch40/aten/src/ATen/native/cuda/Embedding.cu(37): warning: function "__any"
/usr/local/cuda/include/device_atomic_functions.h(180): here was declared deprecated ("__any() is deprecated in favor of __any_sync() and may be removed in a future release (Use -Wno-deprecated-declarations to suppress this warning).")

[ 52%] Building NVCC (Device) object src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/native/cuda/ATen_generated_SpectralOps.cu.o
/usr/include/c++/6/tuple: In instantiation of ‘static constexpr bool std::_TC<<anonymous>, _Elements>::_MoveConstructibleTuple() [with _UElements = {std::tuple<at::Tensor&, at::Tensor&, at::Tensor&>}; bool <anonymous> = true; _Elements = {at::Tensor&, at::Tensor&, at::Tensor&}]’:

...
[see full log below]

src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/build.make:1183: recipe for target 'src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/native/cuda/ATen_generated_SpectralOps.cu.o' failed
make[2]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/native/cuda/ATen_generated_SpectralOps.cu.o] Error 1
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:201: recipe for target 'src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/all] Error 2
Makefile:129: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2
```
## Code example

[Full error_log](https://gist.github.com/floringogianu/29fc809f875e10270f80d673401c7324)

## System Info
- PyTorch: 0.4.0 200fb22b2
- How you installed PyTorch: source (installation failed)
- Build command you used:

```
export CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH=/home/florin/Tools/anaconda3
conda create -n torch40 python==3.6
conda install numpy pyyaml mkl mkl-include setuptools cmake cffi typing
conda install -c pytorch magma-cuda91

git checkout tags/v0.4.0
git submodule update --init

export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/home/florin/Tools/anaconda3/envs/torch40/lib/ (it will not find mkl_64.so otherwise)

python setup.py install
```

- OS: Ubuntu 17.10 x86_64
- Python version: 3.6.0
- CUDA/cuDNN version: release 9.1, V9.1.85 / cudnn 7.1 patchlevel 3
- GPU models and configuration: GeForce GTX 960M - 390.48 
- GCC version (if compiling from source): 6.4.0 (`gcc`, `g++`, `cc`, `c++`)
- CMake version: 3.9.4 in /anaconda/envs/torch40/cmake
- Versions of any other relevant libraries: `conda` 4.5.1
